divs: Sighting DetailsMy son said he was outside and he saw a light that seemed close in the sky and in was just sitting there then dissappeared about 20 seconds after he first saw it. I went to the store later that night (around 1:00am) and on my way home for about 5 seconds, a green fireball looked like it was falling to the earth rapidly and then it dissappeared. About an hour later (seemingly for no reason, there was no inclement weather) every bit of electricity in the neighborhood went out. we were sitting in complete darkness in our living room for about 20 seconds at 2:00am.
Summary: Son saw object then 2 hours later saw green streak drop to earth and power went out.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ontario
This sighting has never been favorited.
